name: 8 To Glory
summary: Choose your favorite rider, slap on some gear, and match up against the world’s best. Follow the real 25th PBR Premier Series season and compete in all 27 events, spanning across the US, ending at the PBR World Finals in Las Vegas. Campaign Mode uses real PBR event scoring to see how you stack up against the competition in events, and in the season standings.

name: 8Towers
summary: Your choices forge your story. Climb the towers, recruit companions, and unlock skills to evolve into new classes. Position your party for synergies, let battles unfold, and claim victory. With shifting stories and auto-battler combat, 8Towers immerses you every run.

name: 8th Avenue
summary: Endless looping streets, elusive anomalies, psychological and courage-testing pressure, the deeper you go, the clearer it becomes, integrate details to trigger multiple endings, success or failure hangs by a thread.

name: 8th Heaven
summary: Reborn on an island paradise filled with fantastical monster-people, live your brand new day-to-day life making friends and indulging in erotic intimacy!

name: 8th Period: Music
summary: A walking simulator inspired by "Exit 8" - Escape using sound as your guide.

name: 8th Millenium: War Against The Pagan Gods
8th Millennium: War Against the Pagan Gods
summary: Nikolai must fight to bury his darkness when he confronts the ruthless power of a dragon seeking to entrap him with visions of his past. Explore the dragon’s kingdom, clear elusive dungeons, and power up to smash your old idols and take down this fierce foe.
